topic.title: What are the best blocklists?
topic.body:
So as I go around in places like ZeroMe, I wonder if there are any good blocklists. I'd like to be able to see what people have made, but at the same time I'd like to not see any illegal content.

What are some good blocklists that are frequently updated?

1581969527_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: This is going to be good.

1582500655_12GAPJTRmNmDZKBXc1419vhTW4WpP.body:
> [z0z0z0z0z0z0z0z0](#comment_55_12zcNM3BD6QwkonPrnCdbWBnGzu9b1rQRA): Reply

I'm not trying to get arrested bc some idiot posts some shit on ZeroMe

1582442446_1JmxhPt4FDP7rTmmaxoKdwTSDhwg5.body: Find good blocklists if you're really worried, some people here hate em' but they're a good way to prevent making mistakes when going around. You can't prevent the data from going on your drive because of the nature of ZeroNet, the best you can do is be careful.

1601916032_1nHMqT985W89soMJx1hSwKQgwqkAA.body: A condemnment doesn't make something illegal
